Room.Name: Riverdell Bush
Room.ShortDescription: You find yourself under a strange berry bush with a number of bees.
Room.LongDescription: The bees don't really bother you if you leave them alone. Your ranger tracking skills are improving with each level. If your goal is to train, you should enter the hole below the small shrub. If you wish to leave the park, go out. If you wish to remain in the park, you must track out of here.
